attributes.additional_details:
In light of recent events (and rightly so) emotions are high regarding the case of April Jones
But please please how many more of our children have to disappear and been found murdered by some twisted sicko
Its time for this government to listen to the people who voted them in and that is to BRING BACK HANGING NOW

This country is sick to the back teeth of our kids not being able to play outside or walk to the shops or school without fear

We need a stricter legal system and a bigger deterrent for murderers
And the only way is the bring back the death sentence

Coz spending life in prison with 3 meals a day, a bed, sky tv, pool tables and gym equipment is more like a holiday camp

And most hardworking people in this country can't afford half of those things that are given to these vile creatures in prison

So for just once will this government listen to what the people want

AND BRING BACK HANGING
